Also if its possible to somehow synchronize the app between devices that would be awesome. title: IMO, it's only missing a mic button
comment: I'm not sure i'll keep it because I lose my talk-to-text ability (on my motorola photon) with it since it has no mic button (it has a smiley button in its place).  But everything else is great.  I swipe left to quickly change all the keys to numbers and symbols, then I swipe right to change back to letters.  Very easy.  You can control the size of the keys in each mode by %.  I set my landscape keyboad to 142%.  Very importantly, the volume up/down buttons turn into cursor left/right buttons and the dedicated camera button turns into a backspace button.  Are there any other keyboard apps that change the hardware buttons' mappings like this?

title: Very well-designed, comprehensive, good for DVORAK
comment: I downloaded this app because I wanted to use the alternative layouts extension pack for it, so that I could use the DVORAK layout.  I was not disappointed.  This is a feature-rich app that is well-designed.  Little details are what seals the deal for me, making this 5 stars.  The keys are a tiny bit small in the vertical direction, but this is made up for by the fact that the autocorrect works very well, and the popup key feature to get accents and other details also works well.  I notice that one of the recent updates seems to have made the popup keys work well.  This keyboard has just about everything you'd need.  I love the third screen of unusual characters, I love the little left and right arrows at the top, I love the words pulled from the dictionary, which is a time saver for very long words.  And I especially love that this app seamlessly and quickly adds new words to the dictionary, asking you first (not doing it without permission) but making it only take a single click.  On the DVORAK app, this one really blows away the other free DVORAK app available.  The other app does seem less error prone vertically with individual keystrokes, but it lags behind in all other areas.
